document.full_text: former motorsport chief max mosley has lost his case on uk media law in a european court, three years after a british tabloid published a story about his sex life.
document.title: ex-f1 boss mosley loses privacy case in strasbourg
lines_and_colors: former motorsport chief max mosley has lost his case on uk media law in a european court, three years after a british tabloid published a story about his sex life.
